FuncDescriptionShort: TD_CONVOLVE2 expands the DSP processing to the image domain
FuncDescriptionLong: This function, the TD_CONVOLVE2, takes two matrices as inputs: one representing the source matrix (image) to be filtered; and, the other matrix being the PSF itself.  The resultant output is the source matrix with the filtering PSF applied.

Description: The source series to be filtered
Input.LangName: data or object or newdata or ... --> Langauges team can work with UAF team to come up with this field
data or object or newdata or ... --> Langauges team can work with UAF team to come up with this field

Description: The TD_CONVOLVE2 function returns only a primary result set.   There are no secondary or tertiary result sets produced by this function.  The primary result set can be retrieved by issuing a SELECT against the analytical table containing the results.
Output.LangName: data or object or newdata or ... --> Langauges team can work with UAF team to come up with this field

InputFmt.Name: INPUT_MODE
Description: Specifies the input mode supported by the function.
